name: Billing Account Number
title: BAN
definition: Identifies the billing account to which the recurring and non- recurring charges for this request will be billed.
validEntryNotes: “NB” represents a non-billing provider that is involved in providing this access service.

When the customer has populated an “E” in the BAN field on the ASR Form, the provider returns a BAN on the Confirmation Notice Form (CN). If the customer determines the BAN is incorrect it is the customer’s responsibility to coordinate the correct BAN assignment.
usageNotes: Required when the ACT field on the ASR Form is “N”, “C”, “D”, “M” or “T” and the RT field is “F”, otherwise optional.
fieldNotes: The precise format will be defined by each provider in accordance with their individual billing procedures and provided to the customers.
If the customer wished to have a new billing account number for this order, an “N” would have been entered in the BAN field on the ASR Form.
BAN on a confirmation for a Hi-Cap facility becomes HBAN on subsequent requests utilizing the Hi-Cap facility.
